isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Bunk Fluorescent And Reading Lights With 48 And 60 Inch Box Sleeper

svcproc.title: Bunk Fluorescent And Reading Lights With 48 And 60 Inch Box Sleeper
svcproc.para: The bunk fluorescent light is a fluorescent light assembly designed to provide the main source of illumination in the sleeper. An additional light switch is located lower in the bunk. The reading light is located in the sleeper bunk to provide illumination for reading when the fluorescent lamp is turned off, or when additional light is needed.
